title: Anil Kapoor:In A Sweet Gesture, Sonam & Anil Kapoor Treat Paparazzi With Laddoos At Diwali Party, Win Hearts
text:
In A Sweet Gesture, Sonam & Anil Kapoor Treat Paparazzi With Laddoos At Diwali Party, Win Hearts

In A Sweet Gesture, Sonam & Anil Kapoor Treat Paparazzi With Laddoos At Diwali Party, Win Hearts

Among the other parties hosted by the Amabanis, Bachchans and Ekta Kapoor, one star-studded Diwali bash was also hosted by Anil Kapoor at his Mumbai residence.

Instagram

In a sweet gesture, the Kapoor family stepped out to distribute laddoos to the paparazzi.

Instagram

First Anil Kapoor came out with a big tray full of laddoos.

Later, daughter Sonam Kapoor and her husband Anand Ahuja also distributed box of laddoos.

The Kapoor family’s sweet gesture won many hearts.

Photographer Viral Bhayani wrote on his Instagram handle, "The Kapoors were such gracious host last night as they took such good care of the press who came to cover the #diwalibash . First came the sweets, then the drinks, later shezwan rice and finally in the end came the tea in the morning" [sic]

Instagram

The Kapoor’s Diwali party was attended by many celebs including Janhvi Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput, Shraddha Kapoor, Sonakshi Sinha.

Instagram

Diwali was all about love, lights and happiness for Bollywood!
